column4: Whiter: Did you clear all private data in the preferences?  You can also set it do delete all private data when you close out fire fox which is kinda nice
yes
what is coming up that you don't want? something in the address bar or a text box...
I use my computer for both personal and buisness stuff... I don't like being in front of clients and using Firefox and having my personally frequented websites polupating the drop down list
do you have any of these sites bookmarked? firefox will bring up bookmarks in the address bar as well
checking to see if they are bookmarked
did you ever figure it out?
Yeah... FF automaticly adds bookmarks to the location bar drop down list
Ok cool
ff 3.5 might have an option to turn this off
I found a solution
in you address bar type in about:config
is there a toggle burried in the about:config somewhere ?
I had to makea change here to get my backspace key working again too :)
trying now
I'm on 8.10 with ff 3.0.12 ... I don't think I have this entry
nevermind that last stmt
ok :D
did that do the job?

thats though, I really appreciate your suggestions
